text:
Le Kremlin-Bicêtre is a town and commune in the southest suburb of Paris, France. It is in the Île-de-France region and the Val-de-Marne department. About 26,018 people lived there in 2006.
Education.
The computer science schools EPITA, École pour l'informatique et les nouvelles technologies and Web@cademie are located at Le Kremlin-Bicêtre. The schools E-Artsup, Coding Academy and IONIS School of Technology and Management are also located in the commune.

annotations.surface_form: École pour l'informatique et les nouvelles technologies
IONIS School of Technology and Management
